table.name: activity
table.remarks: Table containing activity definitions for reporting. If facilities carry out these activities, in many cases they are required to report. Some activities can only be carried out by certain types of facilities. Reporting activities are listed in column 2 of Table 1 of Schedule A of the Greenhouse Gas Industrial Reporting and Control Act: https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/lc/statreg/249_2015.

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of an activity. The activity names come from Schedule A of the British Columbia Greenhouse Gas Emission Reporting Regulation https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/lc/statreg/249_2015#ScheduleA

column.name: applicable_to
column.remarks: Which type of facility the activity applies to. An activity can be valid for only a Single Facility Operation, only a Linear Facilities Operation or it can apply to both

column.name: slug
column.remarks: A varchar slug to identify the activity on the frontend. This will be used to generate the routes to navigate to each activity

column.name: weight
column.remarks: A weighted float value used to order activities. This will be used on the frontend to determine the order in which activity pages appear in an emissions report

table.name: activity_json_schema
table.remarks: Intersection table that assigns a json_schema as valid for a period of time given an activity

column.name: json_schema
column.remarks: The json schema for a specific activity. This defines the shape of the data collected for the related activity

table.name: activity_source_type_json_schema
table.remarks: Intersection table that assigns a json_schema as valid for a period of time given an activity-sourceType pair

column.name: json_schema
column.remarks: The json schema for a specific activity-source type pair. This defines the shape of the data collected for the source type

column.name: has_unit
column.remarks: Whether or not this source type should collect unit data. If true, add a unit schema when buidling the form object

column.name: has_fuel
column.remarks: Whether or not this source type should collect fuel data. If true, add a fuel schema when buidling the form object

table.name: address
table.remarks: Table containing address data. Only Canadian addresses are supported.

column.name: street_address
column.remarks: Street address of relevant location)

column.name: municipality
column.remarks: Municipality of relevant location

column.name: province
column.remarks: Province of the relevant location, restricted to two-letter province postal abbreviations

column.name: postal_code
column.remarks: Postal code of relevant location, limited to valid Canadian postal codes

table.name: app_role
table.remarks: This table contains the definitions for roles within the BCIERs apps. These roles are used to define the permissions a user has within BCIERs apps.

column.name: role_name
column.remarks: The name identifying the role assigned to a user. This role defines their permissions within the app. Also acts as the primary key.

column.name: role_description
column.remarks: Description of the app role

table.name: bc_greenhouse_gas_id
table.remarks: Table to store BCGHG ID metadata. Once an operation or facility meets the criteria for an ID, then it is issued one.

column.name: id
column.remarks: The BCGHG ID of an operation or facility

column.name: issued_at
column.remarks: The time the BCGHG ID was issued by an IRC user

column.name: comments
column.remarks: Comments from admins in the case that a BCGHG ID is revoked

column.name: issued_by_id
column.remarks: The IRC user who issued the BCGHG ID

table.name: bc_obps_regulated_operation
table.remarks: Table to store BC OBPS Regulated Operation metadata. Once an operation has been approved as a BC OBPS Regulated Operations (IRC has determined the operation meets certain criteria and should be included in the program), then it is issued an ID.

column.name: id
column.remarks: The BC OBPS regulated operation ID of an operation when operation is approved

column.name: issued_at
column.remarks: The time the BC OBPS Regulated Operation ID was issued by an IRC user

column.name: comments
column.remarks: Comments from admins in the case that a BC OBPS Regulated Operation ID is revoked

column.name: status
column.remarks: The status of an operation.

column.name: issued_by_id
column.remarks: The IRC user who issued the BC OBPS Regulated Operation ID

table.name: business_role
table.remarks: This table contains the definitions for roles within the operator/operation. These roles are used to define the permissions a user has within the operator/operation.

column.name: role_name
column.remarks: The name identifying the role assigned to a Contact. Also acts as the primary key.

column.name: role_description
column.remarks: Description of the business role

table.name: business_structure
table.remarks: Table containing operator business structures. Business structure refers to the legal and organizational framework under which a business operates (e.g., partnership, sole proprietorship, corporation, limited liability company).

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of a business structure

table.name: closure_event
table.remarks: Closure events for operations and/or facilities.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key to identify the event

column.name: effective_date
column.remarks: The effective date of the event

column.name: description
column.remarks: Rationale for closure or other details.

table.name: compliance_charge_rate
table.remarks: A table to store compliance charge rates by reporting year

column.name: rate
column.remarks: The compliance charge rate in CAD dollars per tCO2e

column.name: reporting_year_id
column.remarks: The associated reporting year for this compliance charge rate

table.name: compliance_obligation
table.remarks: A table to store compliance obligations

column.name: obligation_id
column.remarks: A human-readable identifier for the obligation in format YY-OOOO-R-V

column.name: obligation_deadline
column.remarks: Deadline date for meeting excess emissions obligations (November 30 of the following year), UTC-based

column.name: fee_amount_dollars
column.remarks: The fee amount in CAD dollars

column.name: fee_date
column.remarks: The date the fee was created

column.name: penalty_status
column.remarks: The status of the penalty (e.g., NONE, ACCRUING, PAID)

column.name: compliance_report_version_id
column.remarks: The compliance report version this obligation belongs to

table.name: compliance_period
table.remarks: A table to store compliance periods

column.name: start_date
column.remarks: Start date of the compliance period, UTC-based

column.name: end_date
column.remarks: End date of the compliance period, UTC-based

column.name: compliance_deadline
column.remarks: Deadline date for compliance submissions, UTC-based

column.name: reporting_year_id
column.remarks: The associated reporting year for this compliance period

table.name: compliance_report
table.remarks: This table is the parent anchor table of all compliance data for an operation and compliance period

column.name: compliance_period_id
column.remarks: The compliance period this compliance report is for

column.name: report_id
column.remarks: The emissions report associated with this compliance report

table.name: compliance_report_version
table.remarks: The compliance_report_version table records are generated from the compliance summary data when an emission report is submitted

column.name: excess_emissions_delta_from_previous
column.remarks: The delta of the excess emissions reported in the compliance_summary for this version and the previous one

column.name: credited_emissions_delta_from_previous
column.remarks: The delta of the credited emissions reported in the compliance_summary for this version and the previous one

column.name: status
column.remarks: The status of this compliance report version. Options: [Obligation not met, Obligation fully met, Earned credits]

column.name: compliance_report_id
column.remarks: The parent compliance report object that this compliance report version belongs to

column.name: report_compliance_summary_id
column.remarks: The compliance summary data from the reporting module that this compliance report version relates to

table.name: configuration
table.remarks: Table containing program configurations for a date range. Each record will define a time period for when configuration elements are valid. When a change to the configuration is made a new configuration record will be created. This enables historical accuracy when applying configurations from previous years.

column.name: slug
column.remarks: Unique identifier for a configuration

column.name: valid_from
column.remarks: Date from which the configuration is applicable

column.name: valid_to
column.remarks: Date until which the configuration is applicable

table.name: configuration_element
table.remarks: Element of a configuration, representing a single relationship between multiple entities. Used to define an allowable activity-sourceType-gasType-methodology relationship as per WCI

table.name: contact
table.remarks: Table containing information about contacts. Contacts are people that IRC may need to get in touch with to confirm information about industry. Contacts can be BCIERs app users (in which case they will also have a record in the Users table), but they don't have to be.

column.name: first_name
column.remarks: A user or contact's first name

column.name: last_name
column.remarks: A user or contact's last name

column.name: position_title
column.remarks: A user or contact's position title

column.name: email
column.remarks: A user or contact's email, limited to valid emails

column.name: phone_number
column.remarks: A user or contact's phone number, limited to valid phone numbers

column.name: address_id
column.remarks: Foreign key to the address of a user or contact

column.name: business_role_id
column.remarks: The role assigned to this contact which defines the permissions the contact has.

table.name: custom_methodology_schema
table.remarks: Custom methodology schema used to define additional fields for reporting

table.name: document
table.remarks: Table that contains information about documents such as file metadata, type, and description.

column.name: file
column.remarks: The file format, metadata, etc.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the document

column.name: type_id
column.remarks: Type of document, e.g., boundary map

column.name: operation_id
column.remarks: The operation that the document is about

table.name: document_type
table.remarks: Table that contains types of documents.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Name of document type (e.g. opt in signed statutory declaration)

table.name: elicensing_link
table.remarks: A table to store links between system objects and eLicensing objects

column.name: id
column.remarks: Standard Django primary key

column.name: elicensing_guid
column.remarks: Unique identifier for the eLicensing system integration

column.name: object_id
column.remarks: The ID of the CAS object this link relates to (can be UUID or integer)

column.name: elicensing_object_kind
column.remarks: The type of eLicensing object (client, invoice, fee, etc.)

column.name: elicensing_object_id
column.remarks: The object ID in the eLicensing system

column.name: last_sync_at
column.remarks: The timestamp when this object was last synced with eLicensing

column.name: sync_status
column.remarks: Status of the last sync operation with eLicensing

column.name: content_type_id
column.remarks: The type of CAS object this link relates to

table.name: emission_category
table.remarks: This table contains the set of emission categories that greenhouse gas emissions can be counted under.

column.name: category_name
column.remarks: The name of the emission category as defined in the Greenhouse Gas Emission Reporting Regulation)

column.name: category_type
column.remarks: Type of category defines how it is applied. Basic categories are mandatory and do not overlap with each other. fuel_excluded is dependent on which fuel was consumed & may overlap with basic categories. Other exlcluded have special rules as to when an emission should have this category applied.

table.name: emission_category_mapping
table.remarks: This table contains the set of rules for applying an emission category to an emission based on the activity & source type the emission was reported under.

table.name: facility
table.remarks: Contains data on facilities that emit carbon emissions and must report them to Clean Growth. A Linear Facilities Operation is made up of several different facilities whereas a Single Facility Operation has only one facility. In the case of a single facility operation, much of the data in this table will overlap with the parent record in the operation table.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key to identify the facility

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of the facility when the operation owned it

column.name: type
column.remarks: The type of the facility

column.name: address_id
column.remarks: The address of the facility

column.name: bcghg_id_id
column.remarks: A facility's BCGHG identifier.

column.name: swrs_facility_id
column.remarks: A facility's SWRS facility ID.

column.name: latitude_of_largest_emissions
column.remarks: The latitude of the largest point of emissions

column.name: longitude_of_largest_emissions
column.remarks: The longitude of the largest point of emissions

column.name: is_current_year
column.remarks: The facility's starting date is within the current year or preceeding year

column.name: starting_date
column.remarks: The date of the facility starting operations

column.name: operation_id
column.remarks: The operation who currently owns the facility (see the FacilityDesignatedOperationTimeline for past and upcoming ownership)

table.name: facility_designated_operation_timeline
table.remarks: A table to connect facilities and operations

column.name: start_date
column.remarks: The date an operation became the designated operation of a facility. This data captures the relationship between the facility and operation it falls under.

column.name: end_date
column.remarks: The date an operation stopped being the designated operation of a facility

table.name: facility_report
table.remarks: A table to store individual facility information as part of a report

column.name: facility_name
column.remarks: The name of the facility as reported

column.name: facility_type
column.remarks: The type of the facility as reported

column.name: facility_bcghgid
column.remarks: The BC GHG ID of the facility as reported

column.name: facility_id
column.remarks: The facility record this report was created for, at the time the report was filled out.

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report this facility information is related to

column.name: is_completed
column.remarks: Indicates whether the facility report has been completed.

table.name: fuel_type
table.remarks: This table contains the list of fuel types that can be reported.

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of a fuel type (example: Crude Oil)

column.name: unit
column.remarks: The unit of measurement for this fuel type (example: kilolitres)

column.name: classification
column.remarks: The classification (biomass/non-biomass & exempted/non-exempted) applied to the fuel as determined by GGERR Schedule C (https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/lc/statreg/249_2015#ScheduleC)

table.name: gas_type
table.remarks: This table contains the list of gas types that can be reported as defined in GGERR (Greenhous Gas Emission Reporting Regulation)

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of a greenhouse gas type (example: Carbon Dioxide)

column.name: chemical_formula
column.remarks: The chemical formula representation of a greenhouse gast type (example: CO2)

column.name: cas_number
column.remarks: cas number is a unique value that identifes a gas_type (CO2, CH4...). https://www.cas.org/cas-data/cas-registry

column.name: gwp
column.remarks: GWP is the Global Warming Potential of a specific gas. The GWP value is used to convert gases into a CO2 equivalent value. For example, if CH4 gas has a gwp of 28, then 1 tonne of CH4 is equivalent to 28 tonnes of CO2 (CO2e). Source: https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/complete/statreg/392_2008#section6

table.name: methodology
table.remarks: Table contains the set of reporting methodologies that can be applied to an emission as outlined in GGERR (Greenhous Gas Emission Reporting Regulation)

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of a reporting methodology

table.name: multiple_operator
table.remarks: Table containing data about operations' operators. An operation's designated (primary) operator has a record in the Operator table (this information has been submitted by someone who works for that operator). Any additional operators are stored in this table (additional operator information has been submitted by a user who works for a different operator, so this user should not have access to the Operator table record).

column.name: legal_name
column.remarks: The legal name of an operator

column.name: trade_name
column.remarks: The trade name of an operator

column.name: cra_business_number
column.remarks: The CRA business number of an operator

column.name: bc_corporate_registry_number
column.remarks: The BC corporate registry number of an operator

column.name: business_structure_id
column.remarks: The business structure of an operator

column.name: operation_id
column.remarks: The operation that this multiple operator is associated with

column.name: attorney_address_id
column.remarks: The address of the operator's attorney

table.name: naics_code
table.remarks: Table contains NAICS codes & their descriptions. NAICS code means the 6-digit code applicable to one or more producing units within a reporting operation under the North American Industrial Classification System (NAICS) Canada, 2007, published by Statistics Canada. Operations can have more than one NAICS code. More information, including version history for NAICS codes can be found at https://www.statcan.gc.ca/en/concepts/industry.

column.name: naics_code
column.remarks: NAICS code

column.name: naics_description
column.remarks: Description of the NAICS code

column.name: is_regulated
column.remarks: Whether the NAICS code applies to regulated operations

table.name: naics_regulatory_values
table.remarks: This table contains the regulatory values that apply to a naics code within a set timeframe from where the values are valid and when the values are no longer valid.

column.name: reduction_factor
column.remarks: The Province developed distinct reduction factors for products in the B.C. OBPS with disproportionately higher industrial process emissions than those produced in other sectors. https://www2.gov.bc.ca/assets/gov/environment/climate-change/action/carbon-tax/obps-technical-backgrounder.pdf

column.name: tightening_rate
column.remarks: Tightening rates are planned, yearly, gradual increases to BC OBPS stringency. https://www2.gov.bc.ca/assets/gov/environment/climate-change/action/carbon-tax/obps-technical-backgrounder.pdf

column.name: valid_from
column.remarks: Date from which the regulatory values are applicable

column.name: valid_to
column.remarks: Date until which the regulatory values are applicable

column.name: naics_code_id
column.remarks: Foreign key to the naics_code record that is associated with the regulatory values in this record

table.name: operation
table.remarks: Table containing information about operations. 'Industrial operation' means one or more facilities, or a prescribed activity, to which greenhouse gas emissions are attributable, subject to subsection (3)of the Greenhouse Gas Industrial Reporting and Control Act: https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/complete/statreg/14029_01#section1.

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of an operation

column.name: type
column.remarks: The type of an operation

column.name: swrs_facility_id
column.remarks: An operation's SWRS facility ID. Only needed if the operation submitted a report the previous year.

column.name: bcghg_id_id
column.remarks: An operation's BCGHG identifier.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key to identify the operation

column.name: submission_date
column.remarks: The time the user submitted the operation registration request

column.name: status
column.remarks: The status of an operation in the app (e.g. pending review)

column.name: bc_obps_regulated_operation_id
column.remarks: The BC OBPS regulated operation ID of an operation when operation is approved

column.name: naics_code_id
column.remarks: This column refers to an operation's primary NAICS code.

column.name: operator_id
column.remarks: The operator who owns the operation

column.name: opted_in_operation_id
column.remarks: Details about the operation if it is opted in

column.name: secondary_naics_code_id
column.remarks: This column refers to an operation's secondary NAICS code.

column.name: tertiary_naics_code_id
column.remarks: This column refers to an operation's tertiary NAICS code.

column.name: date_of_first_shipment
column.remarks: The date of the operation's first shipment (determines which application and statutory declaration template should be used)

column.name: registration_purpose
column.remarks: The industry user-selected registration purpose (category). This field is only relevant to Registration 2 module (where it is required for an operation to be registered).

table.name: operation_designated_operator_timeline
table.remarks: A table to connect operations and their designated operators throughout their lifetimes

column.name: start_date
column.remarks: The date the operator started being the designated operator of the operation. The 'designated'/controlling operator isn't necessarily the operation's owner.

column.name: end_date
column.remarks: The date the operator ended being the designated operator of the operation

table.name: operator
table.remarks: Table containing operator information. An operator is the person who owns and/or controls and directs industrial operations. An operator can own multiple operations. For more information see definitions in the Greenhouse Gas Industrial Reporting and Control Act: https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/complete/statreg/14029_01#section1: https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/complete/statreg/14029_01#section1

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key to identify the operator

column.name: legal_name
column.remarks: The legal name of an operator

column.name: trade_name
column.remarks: The trade name of an operator

column.name: cra_business_number
column.remarks: The CRA business number of an operator

column.name: swrs_organisation_id
column.remarks: An identifier used in the CIIP/SWRS dataset (in swrs: organisation = operator). This identifier will only be populated for operators that were imported from that dataset.

column.name: bc_corporate_registry_number
column.remarks: The BC corporate registry number of an operator

column.name: website
column.remarks: The website address of an operator

column.name: status
column.remarks: The status of an operator in the app (e.g. draft)

column.name: business_structure_id
column.remarks: The business structure of an operator

column.name: mailing_address_id
column.remarks: The mailing address of an operator

column.name: physical_address_id
column.remarks: The physical address of an operator (where the operator is physically located)

table.name: opted_in_operation_detail
table.remarks: Table containing details about operations that have opted in

column.name: meets_section_3_emissions_requirements
column.remarks: Does this operation have emissions that are attributable for the purposes of section 3 of the Act?

column.name: meets_electricity_import_operation_criteria
column.remarks: Is this operation an electricity import operation?

column.name: meets_entire_operation_requirements
column.remarks: Designation as an opt-in can only be granted to an entire operation (i.e. not a part or certain segment of an operation). Do you confirm that the operation applying for this designation is an entire operation?

column.name: meets_section_6_emissions_requirements
column.remarks: Does this operation have emissions that are attributable for the purposes of section 6 of the Act?

column.name: meets_naics_code_11_22_562_classification_requirements
column.remarks: Is this operation's primary economic activity classified by the following NAICS Code - 11, 22, or 562?

column.name: meets_producing_gger_schedule_a1_regulated_product
column.remarks: Does this operation produce a regulated product listed in Table 2 of Schedule A.1 of the GGERR?

column.name: meets_reporting_and_regulated_obligations
column.remarks: Is this operation capable of fulfilling the obligations of a reporting operation and a regulated operation under the Act and the regulations?

column.name: meets_notification_to_director_on_criteria_change
column.remarks: Will the operator notify the Director as soon as possible if this operation ceases to meet any of the criteria for the designation of the operation as a reporting operation and a regulated operation?

table.name: parent_operator
table.remarks: Table containing data about operators' parent operators. Parent operators may have a record in the Operator table. If so, that record is controlled by someone who works for that parent operator. The information in this table is controlled by child operators who should not have access to other operator's records.

column.name: operator_index
column.remarks: Index used to differentiate parent operators for the child operator for saving/updating purposes

column.name: legal_name
column.remarks: The legal name of a parent operator

column.name: trade_name
column.remarks: The trade name of a parent operator

column.name: cra_business_number
column.remarks: The CRA business number of a parent operator

column.name: bc_corporate_registry_number
column.remarks: The BC corporate registry number of a parent operator

column.name: website
column.remarks: The website address of a parent operator

column.name: business_structure_id
column.remarks: The business structure of a parent operator

column.name: child_operator_id
column.remarks: The operator that this parent operator is associated with

column.name: mailing_address_id
column.remarks: The mailing address of a parent operator

column.name: physical_address_id
column.remarks: The physical address of a parent operator (where the operator is physically located)

column.name: foreign_address
column.remarks: The address of a non-Canadian parent operator (Canadian operators will have a record in the address table, which only supports Canadian addresses)

column.name: foreign_tax_id_number
column.remarks: The tax ID of a non-Canadian parent operator (non-Canadian operators won't have a CRA business number)

table.name: partner_operator
table.remarks: Table containing data about operators' partner operators. Partner operators may have a record in the Operator table. If so, that record is controlled by someone who works for that partner operator. The information in this table is controlled by BCOBPS operators who should not have access to other operator's records.

column.name: legal_name
column.remarks: The legal name of an operator

column.name: trade_name
column.remarks: The trade name of an operator

column.name: cra_business_number
column.remarks: The CRA business number of an operator

column.name: bc_corporate_registry_number
column.remarks: The BC corporate registry number of an operator

column.name: bc_obps_operator_id
column.remarks: The operator that this partner operator is associated with

column.name: business_structure_id
column.remarks: The business structure of an operator

table.name: product_emission_intensity
table.remarks: This table contains the emission intensity value of a product and the from/to date values that the emission intesity is valid for that product.

column.name: product_weighted_average_emission_intensity
column.remarks: The published B.C. productionweighted average emission intensity (PWAEI) for that product found in Schedule A.1 of the GGERR. https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/lc/statreg/249_2015#ScheduleA

column.name: valid_from
column.remarks: Date from which the emission intensity value is applicable to a product

column.name: valid_to
column.remarks: Date until which the emission intensity value is applicable to a product

column.name: product_id
column.remarks: Foreign key to the product record that the emission intensity values in this record relate to

table.name: regulated_product
table.remarks: Table containing regulated and unregulated products. Regulated product means a product listed in column 2 of Table 2 of Schedule A.1 of the Greenhouse Gas Industrial Reporting and Control Act: https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/lc/statreg/249_2015. Unregulated products have been added to the dataset to assist in grouping some unregulated emissions for further analysis.

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of a regulated product

column.name: is_regulated
column.remarks: Indicates if a product is regulated

column.name: unit
column.remarks: The unit of measure for a regulated product

table.name: report
table.remarks: A table to store report instances. Each operation has at most one report per year.

column.name: operation_id
column.remarks: The operation for which this report was filed

column.name: operator_id
column.remarks: The operator to which this report belongs

column.name: reporting_year_id
column.remarks: The reporting year, for which this report is filled

table.name: report_activity
table.remarks: A table to store the reported activity-specific data, in a JSON format

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: A flat JSON object representing the data collected for this model

column.name: activity_id
column.remarks: The reporting activity this data applies to

column.name: activity_base_schema_id
column.remarks: The activity base schema used to render the form that collected this data

column.name: facility_report_id
column.remarks: The facility report this activity data belongs to

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this data belongs to

table.name: report_additional_data
table.remarks: A table to store the additional data for the report

column.name: capture_emissions
column.remarks: Whether or not capture emissions was selected

column.name: emissions_on_site_use
column.remarks: Emissions on site use

column.name: emissions_on_site_sequestration
column.remarks: Emissions on site sequestration

column.name: emissions_off_site_transfer
column.remarks: Emissions off-site transfer

column.name: electricity_generated
column.remarks: Electricity generated

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this report additional data applies to

table.name: report_attachment
table.remarks: Table containing the file information for the report attachments

column.name: attachment
column.remarks: A file uploaded as an attachment to a report

column.name: attachment_type
column.remarks: The type of attachment this record represents

column.name: attachment_name
column.remarks: The name of the original file that was uploaded, since django adds a hash to avoid file name collisions

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this attachment belongs to

table.name: report_attachment_confirmation
table.remarks: Table containing attachment confirmation information for the supplementary report version

column.name: confirm_supplementary_required_attachments_uploaded
column.remarks: Whether the user confirmed that any attachments required for the supplementary report were uploaded.

column.name: confirm_supplementary_existing_attachments_relevant
column.remarks: Whether the user confirmed that previously uploaded attachments that have not been updated are still relevant to the supplementary report.

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The supplementary report this attachment confirmation information relates to

table.name: report_compliance_summary
table.remarks: This table contains the compliance summary data calculated for a regulated operation.

column.name: emissions_attributable_for_reporting
column.remarks: Total emissions in tCO2e that are considered attributable for reporting. This is the sum of all emissions reported from 'basic' emission categories

column.name: reporting_only_emissions
column.remarks: Total emissions in tCO2e that are considered to be reporting-only emissions. This is the sum of emissions reported from 'excluded' categories and emissions from unregulated products

column.name: emissions_attributable_for_compliance
column.remarks: Total emissions in tCO2e that are counted for compliance. This is the total difference between reporting emissions and reporting-only emissions

column.name: emissions_limit
column.remarks: The emissions limit for the regulated operation. Calculation is in the Greenhouse Gas Emission Reporting Regulation (https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/lc/statreg/249_2015#section14)

column.name: excess_emissions
column.remarks: The total amount of emissions that a regulated operation emmitted above the emissions limit. Definition in in the Greenhouse Gas Emission Reporting Regulation (https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/lc/statreg/249_2015#section14)

column.name: credited_emissions
column.remarks: The total amount of emissions that a regulated operation emitted below the emissions limit. Definition in the Greenhouse Gas Emission Reporting Regulation (https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/lc/statreg/249_2015#section14)

column.name: reduction_factor
column.remarks: The Province developed distinct reduction factors for products in the B.C. OBPS with disproportionately higher industrial process emissions than those produced in other sectors. https://www2.gov.bc.ca/assets/gov/environment/climate-change/action/carbon-tax/obps-technical-backgrounder.pdf

column.name: tightening_rate
column.remarks: Tightening rates are planned, yearly, gradual increases to BC OBPS stringency. https://www2.gov.bc.ca/assets/gov/environment/climate-change/action/carbon-tax/obps-technical-backgrounder.pdf

column.name: initial_compliance_period
column.remarks: The first compliance period (year) that the OBPS (Output Based Pricing System) program began

column.name: compliance_period
column.remarks: The compliance period (year) that this compliance summary data was reported for

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The version of the report this compliance summary data relates to

table.name: report_compliance_summary_product
table.remarks: This table contains the compliance summary data for each product calculated for a regulated operation.

column.name: annual_production
column.remarks: Amount of product produced for the year

column.name: apr_dec_production
column.remarks: Amount of product produced between April & December

column.name: emission_intensity
column.remarks: The published B.C. productionweighted average emission intensity (PWAEI) for that product found in Schedule A.1 of the GGERR. https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/lc/statreg/249_2015#ScheduleA

column.name: allocated_industrial_process_emissions
column.remarks: Total amount of emissions allocated to this product that are categorised as Industrial Process emissions

column.name: allocated_compliance_emissions
column.remarks: Total amount of emissions allocated to this product that are considered as part of the compliance obligation

column.name: product_id
column.remarks: The id of the regulated_product record this product data is for

column.name: report_compliance_summary_id
column.remarks: The report_compliance_summary parent object this product data relates to

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The version of the report this compliance summary data relates to

table.name: report_electricity_import_data
table.remarks: Table storing Electricity Import Data for the reporting system

column.name: import_specified_electricity
column.remarks: Amount of imported electricity - specified sources

column.name: import_specified_emissions
column.remarks: Emissions from specified imports

column.name: import_unspecified_electricity
column.remarks: Amount of imported electricity - unspecified sources

column.name: import_unspecified_emissions
column.remarks: Emissions from unspecified imports

column.name: export_specified_electricity
column.remarks: Amount of exported electricity - specified sources

column.name: export_specified_emissions
column.remarks: Emissions from specified exports

column.name: export_unspecified_electricity
column.remarks: Amount of exported electricity - unspecified sources

column.name: export_unspecified_emissions
column.remarks: Emissions from unspecified exports

column.name: canadian_entitlement_electricity
column.remarks: Amount of electricity categorized as Canadian Entitlement Power

column.name: canadian_entitlement_emissions
column.remarks: Emissions from Canadian Entitlement Power

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The associated report version for this electricity import data

table.name: report_emission
table.remarks: A table to store the reported emission-specific data, in a JSON format

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: A flat JSON object representing the data collected for this model

column.name: gas_type_id
column.remarks: The gas type this emission data applies to

column.name: report_fuel_id
column.remarks: The fuel data this emission data belongs to, if applicable

column.name: report_source_type_id
column.remarks: The source type data this emission data belongs to

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this data belongs to

column.name: report_unit_id
column.remarks: The unit/source sub-type this emission data belongs to, if applicable

checkConstraint.constraint: ((NOT ((report_fuel_id IS NOT NULL) AND (report_unit_id IS NOT NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: fuel_or_unit_but_not_both

table.name: report_emission_allocation
table.remarks: A table to store the emission allocation information of a facility report

column.name: allocation_methodology
column.remarks: The methodology used to calculate the allocated emissions

column.name: allocation_other_methodology_description
column.remarks: A description of the methodology used if 'Other' is selected

column.name: facility_report_id
column.remarks: The facility report this data belongs to

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this data is associated with

table.name: report_fuel
table.remarks: A table to store the reported fuel-specific data, in a JSON format

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: A flat JSON object representing the data collected for this model

column.name: fuel_type_id
column.remarks: The fuel type this data applies to

column.name: report_source_type_id
column.remarks: The source type data this unit data belongs to

column.name: report_unit_id
column.remarks: The unit form data this fuel data belongs to, if applicable

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this data belongs to

table.name: report_methodology
table.remarks: A table to store the reported methodology-specific data, in a JSON format

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: A flat JSON object representing the data collected for this model

column.name: report_emission_id
column.remarks: The emission data this methodology applies to

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this data belongs to

column.name: methodology_id
column.remarks: The methodology this data applies to

table.name: report_new_entrant
table.remarks: Table storing new entrant emissions data for the reporting system

column.name: authorization_date
column.remarks: Date of authorization for emission reporting

column.name: first_shipment_date
column.remarks: Date of the first shipment related to this report (if applicable)

column.name: new_entrant_period_start
column.remarks: Start date of the new entrant reporting period

column.name: assertion_statement
column.remarks: Indicates if the assertion statement is certified

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The associated report version for this new entrant record

table.name: report_new_entrant_emission
table.remarks: Table for storing emission data related to new entrant

column.name: emission
column.remarks: The amount of production associated with this report

column.name: emission_category_id
column.remarks: The emission category

column.name: report_new_entrant_id
column.remarks: The new entrant report to which this production record belongs

table.name: report_new_entrant_production
table.remarks: Table for storing production data related to new entrant emissions reporting

column.name: production_amount
column.remarks: The amount of production associated with this report

column.name: product_id
column.remarks: The regulated product associated with this production record

column.name: report_new_entrant_id
column.remarks: The new entrant report to which this production record belongs

table.name: report_non_attributable_emissions
table.remarks: A table to store non-attributable emissions data.

column.name: activity
column.remarks: The name or description of the activity.

column.name: source_type
column.remarks: The type of source responsible for the emission.

column.name: emission_category_id
column.remarks: The emission category associated with this emission.

column.name: facility_report_id
column.remarks: The facility report this activity data belongs to

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report this operation information relates to

table.name: report_operation
table.remarks: A table to store operation information as part of a report

column.name: operator_legal_name
column.remarks: The legal name of the operator operating this operation

column.name: operator_trade_name
column.remarks: The trade name of the operator operating this operation

column.name: operation_name
column.remarks: The name of the operation, for which this report is

column.name: operation_type
column.remarks: The type of the operation, LFO or SFO

column.name: operation_bcghgid
column.remarks: The BCGHGH ID of the operation

column.name: bc_obps_regulated_operation_id
column.remarks: The BC OBPS Regulated Operation ID (BORO ID) for this operation

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report this operation information relates to

column.name: registration_purpose
column.remarks: The Registration purpose of the operation

table.name: report_operation_representative
table.remarks: Stores information about operation representatives linked to report versions, including their selection status for reports.

column.name: representative_name
column.remarks: The name of the operation representative.

column.name: selected_for_report
column.remarks: Indicates whether this representative is selected for reporting.

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version associated with this operation representative.

table.name: report_person_responsible
table.remarks: A table to store the data about the person responsible for the report

column.name: first_name
column.remarks: A user or contact's first name

column.name: last_name
column.remarks: A user or contact's last name

column.name: position_title
column.remarks: A user or contact's position title

column.name: email
column.remarks: A user or contact's email, limited to valid emails

column.name: phone_number
column.remarks: A user or contact's phone number, limited to valid phone numbers

column.name: street_address
column.remarks: The street address of the contact.

column.name: municipality
column.remarks: The municipality of the contact.

column.name: province
column.remarks: The province of the contact.

column.name: postal_code
column.remarks: The postal code of the contact.

column.name: business_role
column.remarks: The business role of the contact.

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this person responsible applies to

table.name: report_product
table.remarks: A table storing the production information for a single product, as part of a facility report

column.name: annual_production
column.remarks: The total annual production for the product, expressed in the unit of this same model.

column.name: production_data_apr_dec
column.remarks: The total production amount for April to December period, expressed in the unit of this same model.

column.name: production_methodology
column.remarks: The production methodoogy used to make this product

column.name: storage_quantity_start_of_period
column.remarks: The quantity of product in storage at the beginning of the compliance period, if applicable

column.name: storage_quantity_end_of_period
column.remarks: The quantity of product in storage at the end of the compliance period, if applicable

column.name: quantity_sold_during_period
column.remarks: The quantity of product sold during the compliance period, if applicable

column.name: quantity_throughput_during_period
column.remarks: The quantity of throughput at point of sale during the compliance period, if applicable

column.name: facility_report_id
column.remarks: The facility report this production information belongs to

column.name: product_id
column.remarks: The product this production information is about

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report this production information relates to

column.name: production_methodology_description
column.remarks: In case the production methodology is 'other', industrial reporters are required to enter details about the methodology used.

table.name: report_product_emission_allocation
table.remarks: A table to store the allocated amount of emissions for a given product

column.name: allocated_quantity
column.remarks: The quantity of emissions allocated to this product in tonnes of CO2 equivalent(tCO2e)

column.name: emission_category_id
column.remarks: The emission category that this emission data belongs to

column.name: report_product_id
column.remarks: The regulated product this emission data has been allocated to

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this data is associated with

column.name: report_emission_allocation_id
column.remarks: The report emission allocation this emission data belongs to

table.name: report_raw_activity_data
table.remarks: Stores raw activity JSON data before processing into report activities

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The raw activity JSON data collected from the form before processing

column.name: activity_id
column.remarks: The reporting activity this raw activity JSON data applies to

column.name: facility_report_id
column.remarks: The facility report this raw activity JSON data belongs to

table.name: report_sign_off
table.remarks: Stores information about the sign-off of a report, including the user's certification of due diligence, understanding of the report's purpose, and the impact of the information provided. Also stores the user's signature and the date and time of the sign-off.

column.name: acknowledgement_of_review
column.remarks: Whether the user has certified that they have reviewed the report, and that they have ensured that the information included in this report is true and complete.

column.name: acknowledgement_of_records
column.remarks: Whether the user has understood that the information provided in the report may require records from the Operator evidencing the truth of this report.

column.name: acknowledgement_of_information
column.remarks: Whether the user has understood that this information is being collected for the purpose of emission reporting under the Greenhouse Gas Industrial Reporting and Control Act and may be disclosed to the Ministry responsible for the administration and enforcement of the Carbon Tax Act.

column.name: acknowledgement_of_possible_costs
column.remarks: Whether the user has understood that the information provided in this report can impact any compliance obligation of this operation and that any errors, omissions, or misstatements can lead to an additional compliance obligation or administrative penalties.

column.name: acknowledgement_of_new_version
column.remarks: Whether the user has understood that the sign-off is creating a new report version that will be the report for the reporting or compliance period that it pertains to.

column.name: signature
column.remarks: The signature of the user who signed off the report

column.name: signing_date
column.remarks: The date and time the report was signed off

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report this sign-off information relates to

column.name: acknowledgement_of_corrections
column.remarks: Whether the user has understood that correction of any errors, omissions, or misstatements in the new submission of this report may lead to an additional compliance obligation, and, if submitted after the compliance obligation deadline, applicable interest.

column.name: acknowledgement_of_certification
column.remarks: Whether the user has certified that the amount of total emissions reported, and all other information included in this report, is complete and accurate.

column.name: acknowledgement_of_errors
column.remarks: Whether the user has acknowledged that any errors, omissions, or misstatements in this report may result in administrative penalties or additional compliance obligations.

table.name: report_source_type
table.remarks: A table to store the reported source type-specific data, in a JSON format

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: A flat JSON object representing the data collected for this model

column.name: activity_source_type_base_schema_id
column.remarks: The activity-source-type base schema used to render the form that collected this data

column.name: report_activity_id
column.remarks: The activity data record this source type data belongs to

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this data belongs to

column.name: source_type_id
column.remarks: The source type this data applies to

table.name: report_unit
table.remarks: A table to store the reported unit-specific data, in a JSON format

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: A flat JSON object representing the data collected for this model

column.name: report_source_type_id
column.remarks: The source type data this unit data belongs to

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version this data belongs to

column.name: type
column.remarks: The data type for this unit record, whether it's a regular `Unit` or a `Source sub-type` for an oil and gas activity.

table.name: report_verification
table.remarks: Table to store verification information associated with a report version

column.name: verification_body_name
column.remarks: The name of the verification body conducting the verification

column.name: accredited_by
column.remarks: The verification accreditation body

column.name: scope_of_verification
column.remarks: The scope of the verification

column.name: threats_to_independence
column.remarks: Indicates whether there were any threats to independence noted

column.name: verification_conclusion
column.remarks: The conclusion of the verification

column.name: report_version_id
column.remarks: The report version of this report verification

table.name: report_verification_visit
table.remarks: Table to store individual verification visit information

column.name: visit_name
column.remarks: The name of the site visited (Facility X, Other, or None)

column.name: visit_type
column.remarks: The type of visit conducted (Virtual or In Person)

column.name: visit_coordinates
column.remarks: Geographic location of an other facility visited

column.name: is_other_visit
column.remarks: Flag to indicate the visit is an other facility visited

column.name: report_verification_id
column.remarks: The report verification associated with this visit

table.name: report_version
table.remarks: A table representing the multiple versions that a single report can have.

column.name: is_latest_submitted
column.remarks: True if this version is the latest submitted one

column.name: status
column.remarks: The status for this report version: Draft or Submitted.

column.name: report_id
column.remarks: The report to which this version applied.

column.name: report_type
column.remarks: Report type

column.name: reason_for_change
column.remarks: Reason explaining why a supplementary report change was made.

table.name: reporting_field
table.remarks: A field name/type combination that relates to a configuration element record through the config_element_reporting_field intersection table. Used to dynamically create a form schema from the configuration

column.name: field_name
column.remarks: Name of field needed for the related configuration element.

column.name: field_type
column.remarks: Type definition for field.

column.name: field_units
column.remarks: Units of measurement relating to the field.

table.name: reporting_year
table.remarks: Reporting year

column.name: reporting_year
column.remarks: Year for the reporting year, unique and serves as primary key

column.name: reporting_window_start
column.remarks: Start of the reporting period for that reporting year, UTC-based

column.name: reporting_window_end
column.remarks: End of the reporting period for that reporting year, UTC-based

column.name: report_due_date
column.remarks: Due date for the annual report for that reporting year, UTC-based

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description for the reporting year

table.name: restart_event
table.remarks: Restart events for operations and/or facilities after they have been closed or temporarily shutdown.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key to identify the event

column.name: effective_date
column.remarks: The effective date of the event

table.name: source_type
table.remarks: Source types

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of a source type

column.name: json_key
column.remarks: A truncated and camel cased version on the source type name that is used as a key when building the json schema dynamically

table.name: temporary_shutdown_event
table.remarks: Temporary shutdown events for operations and/or facilities.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key to identify the event

column.name: effective_date
column.remarks: The effective date of the event

column.name: description
column.remarks: Rationale for temporary shutdown or other details.

table.name: transfer_event
table.remarks: Transfer events for operations and/or facilities.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key to identify the event

column.name: effective_date
column.remarks: The effective date of the event

column.name: from_operation_id
column.remarks: The operation that facilities are being transferred from.

column.name: from_operator_id
column.remarks: The operator who is transferring the operation or facility.

column.name: to_operation_id
column.remarks: The operation that facilities are being transferred to.

column.name: to_operator_id
column.remarks: The operator who is receiving the operation or facility.

table.name: user
table.remarks: Table containing information about app users. Industry users are all associated with a business and are identified via their Business BCEID.

column.name: first_name
column.remarks: A user or contact's first name

column.name: last_name
column.remarks: A user or contact's last name

column.name: position_title
column.remarks: A user or contact's position title

column.name: email
column.remarks: A user or contact's email, limited to valid emails

column.name: phone_number
column.remarks: A user or contact's phone number, limited to valid phone numbers

column.name: user_guid
column.remarks: A GUID to identify the user

column.name: business_guid
column.remarks: A GUID to identify the business

column.name: bceid_business_name
column.remarks: The name of the business the user is associated with as per their Business BCeID account

column.name: app_role_id
column.remarks: The role assigned to this user which defines the permissions the use has.

table.name: user_operator
table.remarks: Through table to connect Users and Operators and track access requests

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key to identify the user operator

column.name: role
column.remarks: The role of a user associated with an operator (e.g. admin)

column.name: status
column.remarks: The status of a user operator in the app (e.g. pending review)

column.name: verified_at
column.remarks: The time a user operator was verified by an IRC user

column.name: operator_id
column.remarks: An operator associated with a user

column.name: user_id
column.remarks: A user associated with an operator

column.name: verified_by_id
column.remarks: The IRC user who verified the user operator

column.name: user_friendly_id
column.remarks: A user-friendly ID to identify the user operator

table.name: well_authorization_number
table.remarks: A table containing well authorization numbers. Authorization numbers are assigned by the British Columbia Energy Regulator: https://www.bc-er.ca/what-we-regulate/oil-gas/wells/. Facilities can have multiple well authorization numbers.

column.name: well_authorization_number
column.remarks: A well authorization number from the BC Energy Regulator
